summary: Email correspondence between Lloyd Epstein and an Assistant US Attorney regarding a request to adjourn a case involving an individual named Guerrero. Lloyd Epstein relays that Guerrero was in a bad traffic accident and is not fully recovered, seeking a one-month adjournment.

persons.name: Lloyd Epstein
persons.context: Attorney communicating with a US Attorney's office to request an adjournment for a client named Guerrero, citing a traffic accident.

persons.name: Guerrero
persons.context: Individual whose case is being adjourned; described as having been in a bad traffic accident and not fully recovered.

connections.description: Lloyd Epstein is acting as attorney for Guerrero, requesting an adjournment of Guerrero's case.

events.title: Adjournment Request for Guerrero
events.description: Lloyd Epstein requests an adjournment of Guerrero's case for another month, citing Guerrero's recovery from a bad traffic accident.

keyFacts: Lloyd Epstein, an attorney, requested an adjournment for a client named Guerrero in September 2016.
The adjournment was requested because Guerrero was in a bad traffic accident and was not fully recovered.
The communication was between Lloyd Epstein and an Assistant US Attorney (AUSA), whose name is redacted in the document.
The email chain shows coordination within the US Attorney's office regarding the adjournment request.
